title: The Gathering 2016: Orange County, CA
desc: Cancellations on or before April 1, 2016: Any registration purchased prior to April 1 can be 1) transferred to another person free of charge on EventBrite, 2) transferred to the Gathering 2017 less a $25 nonrefundable administration fee or 3) refunded back in full to the original credit card used less a $25 nonrefundable administration fee. Cancellations made after April 1, 2016: After April 1, any purchased registration can be 1) transferred to another person free of charge or 2) transferred to the Gathering 2017 less a $25 nonrefundable administration fee. No monetary refunds will be issued after April 1.? ? You may request a refund on or before April 1, 2016. To do so, log in to your eventbrite account and select your ticket or order. Select "request a refund" and a request will be forwarded to The Gathering event staff. The card used to purchase your registration will be refunded the full amount less a $25 administration fee. Please allow 7 days for the refund to process.? You may give your ticket to someone else at any point free of charge. To do so, log in to your eventbrite.com account and select your ticket or order. Click "edit" and update the contact information to the correct person. When finished, they will receive an email to accept the ticket. Note: if you gift a ticket very close to the event, you may need to stop by the registration table on arrival to get a correct name tag.
